sentences.en: Eurasian evergreen thorny shrubs bearing red or orange - red berries.
sentences.cn: 长出红的或橘子红的浆果的欧亚的长青多刺灌木.

sentences.en: Find out that the sisters of the most holy thorny crown are involved in the cover - up?
sentences.cn: 查明这些头戴神圣象征的修女们也和这起阴谋有牵连?

sentences.en: He skin his leg when walking along the thorny path.
sentences.cn: 他在长满荆棘的小道上行走时擦破了腿上的皮.

sentences.en: More recently, he has had to contend with thorny personnel issues.
sentences.cn: 最近, 他已经不得不参加棘手的个人事件.

sentences.en: The boys argued over the thorny points in the lesson.
sentences.cn: 孩子们辩论功课中的难点.

sentences.en: The dog hurt one of its pad when it stepped upon a thorny path.
sentences.cn: 这只狗在踏上一条有荆棘的小路时，伤了一只爪垫。

sentences.en: The dog hurt one of its pad when It'stepped upon a thorny path.
sentences.cn: 这只狗在踏上一条有荆棘的小路时,伤了一只爪垫.

sentences.en: The new path was a thorny one.
sentences.cn: 这条新路上是荆棘丛生的.

sentences.en: The plant's thorny stalk discourages fish from nibbling on it.
sentences.cn: 这种植物多刺的茎阻碍了鱼儿对它的啃咬.

sentences.en: The question is, how shall I say, quite thorny.
sentences.cn: 这个问题, 我该怎么说呢, 十分棘手.

sentences.en: The roses are thorny. Take care not to prick your hands.
The stems are as thick as a man's finger and very thorny.
sentences.cn: “玫瑰巨人”的枝干多刺,粗细和男人的手指差不多.

sentences.en: the thorny question of immigration policy
sentences.cn: 移民政策这个棘手的问题

sentences.en: This thorny problem on the invironmental protection floored the new mayor.
sentences.cn: 这个关于环境保护的棘手难题把新任市长难住了.

sentences.en: What matters is not the thorny path but a weak mind.
With that thorny issue out of the way the rest followed easily.
sentences.cn: 这个棘手的问题一经解决,其余的事就好办了.

words.tran_cn: 多刺的；痛苦的；令人苦恼的

trans.tran_en: a thorny bush, plant etc has thorns
